dct_description_sm: performed by John Speede; Jodocus Hondius caelavit.
Bar scale on map given in "The scale of miles."
Index for inset map: Cheife places of ye citie by figurs noted.
Decorative border and cartouches, compass rose, coats of arms (labeled), including the Royal Coat of Arms for the United Kingdom with lion and unicorn.
Appears in Speed's Theatre of the Empire of Great Britain, 1676.
dct_publisher_sm: are to be sold in Popes head Alley by John Sudbury and George Humble
